description.value:
They say the best defense is a good offense. Well, who's to say your shield can't provide both.

You treat shields you wield as martial melee weapons with a damage die of 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Shields that lack the Heavy trait gain the trait Thrown (20/60). Shields with the Heavy or Two-Handed trait gain an additional trait Versatile (1d8).

system.requirements: Must have the Fighter Starter Abilities
